sql_mapping.insert: insert into mt_tag (tag_id, tag, created_date, modified_date) values (#tag_id#, '#tag#', '#created_date#', '#modified_date#')
sql_mapping.select: select * from mt_tag where tag_id in (#tag_ids#)

select t.*, ot.object_type_id, ot.object_id, ot.`group`, ot.`order` from mt_tag t inner join mt_object_tag ot on ot.tag_id=t.tag_id and ot.object_type_id=#object_type_id# and ot.object_id in (#object_ids#)
select count(tag_id) total from mt_tag where #conditions#
